features.title: Why Leela Chess Zero?
features.subtitle: Lc0 is a direct open-source implementation inspired by DeepMind's AlphaZero project, and it has far exceeded its success in chess.

items.title: Self-Learning Neural Network
items.description: Lc0 uses a neural network that learned chess through self-play, resulting in a unique style, free from all human bias.

items.title: Deep Positional Insight
items.description: Leela understands long-term strategy, pawn structures, and subtle moves.

items.title: Open Source
items.description: Completely free and open source under the GPLv3.0, developed by a community of enthusiasts and researchers.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: LCZero is powered by a community of chess enthusiasts, programmers, and researchers.
